original_text: Then Jesus said to all the people that were there, ‘A person who wants to be my disciple must not think about himself. He must decide that his own life is not important. Every day he must be like someone who carries his own cross to go and die. Then he may come with me as my disciple.
korean_text: 또 무리에게 이르시되 아무든지 나를 따라오려거든 자기를 부인하고 날마다 제 십자가를 지고 나를 따를 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to all the people that were there
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 거기 있는 모든 사람들에게 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: A person who wants to be my disciple
He must decide that his own life is not important
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 자신의 생명이 중요하지 않다고 결정해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Every day he must be like someone
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 매일 어떤 사람처럼 되어야 한다

sentences.original_text: Then he may come with me as my disciple
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 나의 제자로 나와 함께 올 수 있다
